name: [PENDING NAME]
description:
[PENDING NAME] is a 1v1 strategy game.

Each player starts on his side of the board, their goal is to reach the other player's side.

Each turn, the player can do an action (move, place wall, medidate, etc), if he has enough energy to do so

The only rule is that a player cannot place walls that would totally block one player's way to his goal

Tip: You can set the size of the board here. (owner of the room only)

HOW TO PLAY:

JOINING A MATCH: Press "Join Match" then press "Join" on desired room

MATCH CREATION: Press "Create Match" then fill the room name and set your desired board size

You can also choose which abilities will be available during the game by checking "Use selected abilities"
